# readWithoutEncryption(serviceCodeList:blockList:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Sends the Read Without Encryption command, as defined by the FeliCa card specification, to the tag.

## Declaration

```swift
func readWithoutEncryption(serviceCodeList: [Data], blockList: [Data], completionHandler: @escaping (Int, Int, [Data], (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func readWithoutEncryption(serviceCodeList: [Data], blockList: [Data]) async throws -> (Int, Int, [Data])
```

## Reading and Writing Without Encryption

- **writeWithoutEncryption(serviceCodeList:blockList:blockData:completionHandler:)**: Sends the Write Without Encryption command, as defined by the FeliCa card specification, to the tag.

items.description: Sends the Write Without Encryption command, as defined by the FeliCa card specification, to the tag.
